name: Get tweets with the Premium API
description:
In order to use the Premium API, you need to register an app at Twitter and create a fullarchive environment. See https://developer.twitter.com/en/premium-apis

Then set the client ID and client secret of your premium account in the settings and click Login to get an access token. Change the <label> parameter to the name of your environment.

Careful: you have only 50 free requests per month.

The preset fetches tweets where a user was addressed. Add user IDs or screen names as seed nodes and change or remove the fromDate and toDate parameters.

Twitter documentation: https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/search/api-reference/premium-search
